title: Exhibition formally known as Synthetics (EFKS)
brief_description: An exhibition that charts the history of the electronically generated image in Australia from 1969 - 1988 (roughly). Includes case studies by artists whose creative innovations have influenced significantly the evolution of electronic media arts. (see: Documentation for details)
